review_text: I had an amazing experience at Notre Dame College. The professors were knowledgeable and supportive, and the campus had a great atmosphere. The extracurricular activities were also diverse and engaging. My only complaint is that the cafeteria food could use some improvement.

I cannot say enough good things about Dhaka College, Dhaka! The academics are top-notch, and I felt challenged in the best possible way. The career services helped me secure a fantastic internship, which eventually led to a job offer. The friendships I made here will last a lifetime. Proud to be an ABC alumnus!

Overall, my experience at Dhaka Commerce College was positive. The campus is beautiful, and some of the professors are excellent. However, I felt that the class sizes were too large in some cases, making it challenging to get personalized attention. It would be great to see smaller class options in the future.

Adamjee Cantonment Public School & Collegeis a great place for science enthusiasts like me. The research opportunities are abundant, and the labs are well-equipped. The faculty members are approachable and passionate about their subjects. The only downside is the lack of funding for some research projects.

As an art major, I enjoyed the creative Rajuk Uttara Model College offered. The art facilities are impressive, and the professors encouraged me to explore various techniques. However, I believe there could be more collaboration between different departments to enhance interdisciplinary projects.
